headline: A Disputed New Freedom for Israelis: Buses on the Sabbath
abstract: Ultraconservative Orthodox groups may protest, but for many Israelis, the buses offer a new freedom to travel on the weekend.
lead_paragraph: TEL AVIV â€” The ritual Friday-night scramble for a parking space was well underway, but for once, Rob and Netta Geist Pinfold watched it unfold with a smile.
